TopicTitle: Kerbin Science Check List - Spread Sheet

Articles.Content:
I wanted a spread sheet to show how much science I could do on Kerbin, so here it is.

So far it's working for me, and I left a template in for the check marks.

Eventually when more biomes are figured out on other planets, more spread sheets can be made for them.

This is all going on information I got from the Wiki on Biomes.

You can also get a mod showing how many more times you can repeat a mission before you'll no longer receive science points (hopefully will be a part of the game at some point).

Hope this helps some people.

https://www.dropbox.com/s/79no560nistmruh/KSP%20-%20Kerbin%20Science%20Template.xlsx

Edited October 21, 2013 by lazr3th

A couple of things I've encountered - if anyone is trying this.

I can't get the "Runway" Biome to register on any tests, so it doesn't exist for me.

I also can't get "Lower Atmosphere" tests over said "Runway" or the "Launchpad" and "Kerbal Space Port" - those all go into the "Kerbal's Shores" biome.
